titleStmt.title: The housholders new-yeeres gift containing a pleasant dialogue betwixt the husband and his wife, pleasant to be regarded. To the tune of, where is my true-love.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed [by E. Purslowe] for F. Coules, dwelling in the Old-Bayly,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name from STC; publication date estimated by STC.
Printed on same sheet with STC 1331.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
